meanings.definition: The quality or state of being able to be analyzed.
meanings.sent1: The analyzabilities of the data made it easy to understand.
meanings.sent2: Scientists rely on the analyzabilities of samples to draw conclusions.
meanings.sent3: The analyzabilities of the puzzle pieces helped solve the mystery.
meanings.sent4: Her mind had an endless array of analyzabilities waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The analyzabilities of the situation were crystal clear to everyone.

meanings.definition: The ability to be broken down or examined in detail.
meanings.sent1: Teachers appreciate the analyzabilities of complex topics for better teaching.
meanings.sent2: The analyzabilities of the problem allowed for a thorough investigation.
meanings.sent3: The analyzabilities of the recipe made it easy to follow.
meanings.sent4: His speech had so many analyzabilities, it kept the audience engaged.
meanings.sent5: The analyzabilities of the painting revealed hidden details.
